What fast food restaurant is the healthiest not counting subway?
In: Lifestyle › Dining Out › Subway Restaurant
Rate This Answer
From the Huffington Post: A traditional fast-food chain, McDonald's, cracked our top 10 healthiest fast food restaurants. Sure, it's the home of the Big Mac, but did you know it also serves a mean yogurt-and-granola parfait? Answered

Facebook Tweet Email Advertisement About Subway Restaurant
Subway is the world's largest submarine sandwich chain with more than 34,000 stores around the world. Subway specializes in submarine sandwiches and salads, and now breakfast food. Subway is headquartered in Milford, Connecticut and has restaurants in 95 countries. Subway's advertising slogan is ''Eat Fresh.''
More about Subway Restaurant »
About Fast Food
''Fast food'' has become a regular part of people's vocabulary since the 1950's. The convenient, fast, and relatively cheap prices of fast food restaurants have made them some of the most popular stops for people on the move. Offering typical American foods like burgers, fries, and soft drinks, fast food restaurants have a definite American vibe and foothold.
More about Fast Food »
